reasoning: New UI component and API endpoint following existing patterns. Touches both frontend and backend (2 services), estimated 6-8 files. No external integrations or infrastructure changes. Similar timeline pattern exists in AuditLogPage.

scope.notes: Frontend: Timeline component, InspectionHistoryPage/route, API integration. Backend: New endpoint to fetch inspection history with user/type details.

integrations.notes: Using existing Material UI components. No new packages required. All patterns exist in codebase.

infrastructure.notes: Existing Inspection table has all required data. No schema changes needed. No environment variables required.

knowledge.notes: AuditLogPage demonstrates similar timeline/history UI pattern. API patterns well-established in inspections.ts. MUI components already in use.

concerns: API endpoint needs to join inspections with users and consultant types
Timeline component should be reusable for future features
Date filtering logic needs proper implementation
risk.notes: Well-defined scope with clear design reference. No breaking changes. Low risk of impacting existing features.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: New API endpoint and UI component require testing. Unit tests for component logic and timeline formatting. Integration tests for API endpoint. No security-sensitive operations involved.
